content:
Hello, i hope this finds you well, whenever i try to add bitbucket integration following the website on zulip, i get an error 500, internal server error, i tried everything, any help?
@Tim Abbott
@Samer Diab what version of Bitbucket are you using? And what version of Zulip?
You might need to upgrade to master for some versions of Bitbucket to work.
I just took a look at the repo, i am at v2.0.4x i will update now, and check for progress, as for bit bucket, on normal bitbucket, i canâ€™t differentiate between bitbucket3 and 2 tbh.
So i just tried to upgrade zulip and run the requests again from bitbucket, still internal server error, any help? @Tim Abbott
I just test jira webhooks and they work perfectly

Hello @Tim Abbott , i hope you are doing well, i did some more investigation, and i figured that there might be something different between the json file expected and sent, can you help me solve this? Thank you
